definition: Zhao Wei or Vicky Zhao (1976-), Chinese film star
to surpass (old)
surname Zhao/one of the seven states during the Warring States Period (476-220 BC)/the Former Zhao 前趙 (304-329) and Later Zhao 後趙 (319-350), states of the Sixteen Kingdoms
Osmunda regalis, a species of fern/Taiwan pr. [wei2]

sentences.english: Actress Zhao Wei ran second in the poll.
sentences.chinese: 此次评选活动中演员赵薇占得次席。

sentences.english: Zhao revealed in an interview it was the first official post she had ever gained.
sentences.chinese: 赵薇在接受采访时称这也是她自小到大第一次当官。

sentences.english: Vicky Zhao portrayed a very ugly person in the film Shaolin Football.
sentences.chinese: 赵薇在电影《少林足球》中扮演一个奇丑无比的人。

sentences.english: Zhao Wei will play Sun Shangxiang, the little sister of Sun Quan, the emperor of the Wu Kingdom.
sentences.chinese: 赵薇将在影片中扮演吴国皇帝孙权的小妹孙上香。

sentences.english: Not a few critics didn't give their hat to the breakthrough of sterotype of Zhou and Zhao.
sentences.chinese: 网上有不少评论赞周迅和赵薇的角色突破，不以为然。

sentences.english: But Zhao's broker said that Zhao will not appear in the gala.
sentences.chinese: 但赵薇的经纪人称赵薇不参加今年的春晚。

sentences.english: But Zhao's broker said that Zhao will not appear in the gala.
sentences.chinese: 但赵薇的经纪人称赵薇不参加今年的春晚。
